title: /nick
content: /nick nickname: define the nickname of the user on the server.

title: /list
content: /list [string]: list the available channels from the server. If string is specified, only displays those whose name contains the string.

title: /create
content: /create channel: create a channel with the specified name.

title: /delete
content: /delete channel: delete the channel with the specified name.

title: /users
content: /users: list the users currently in the channel.

title: /msg
content: /msg nickname message: send a private the message to the specified nickname.

title: message
content: message: send message the all the users on the channel.
